title: Newest Cakewalk Sonar Producer Edition 8.02 ISO + x68 Update
description:
Cakewalk Sonar producer Edition 8.02 - NO cracks needed!!

(Note: 8.01 and 8.02 Update Patches are 32 bit only)

Hi guys, my very first torrent, please bear with me.

This is a combination of all of ALL of the current available Sonar 8.0 available on the torrent scene as of 12/18/08. No cracks needed!!

It includes:

- The full Sonar 8.0 ISO, only found so far as an .ISZ file, which requires recent versions of 120% Alcohol, Daemon Tools, or UltraISO to convert. I have extracted, and converted the ISZ to a working ISO.

- The 176 Mb updates provided by mspeedo here:

However, now that the valid serials have since been released, I removed the cracks needed to get around the issue, along with the activation crack. It will install and run perfectly with the provided serials.

The 8.01 and 8.02 update patches (only for 32 Bit so far, no x64 updates have been released as far as I know, but I believe the ISO will install fine on 64bit, just no updates yet.)

And finally the fully working Team Beat Serials for both install and registration that were released after the original sonar 8 (with cracks) hit the web.

This has all been combined, cleaned up, outdated patches removed, and neatly put together all in one ISO with a fresh, easy to follow setup guide.

Enjoy! And a big thanks to the original uploaders.
